Top Places to visit in Kalahandi, Bhawanipatna, Odisha
content: Kalahandi is a district of Odisha in India. The region had a glorious past and great civilisation in ancient time. Archaeological evidence of stone age and Iron Age human settlement has been recovered from the region. Asurgarh offered an advanced, well civilised, cultured and urban human settleme

title: Top Places to visit in Kendujhar (Keonjhar), Odisha
content: Kendujhar District, also known as Keonjhar District is an administrative district of Odisha. The district is one of the fifth Scheduled Areas of Odisha. The town of Kendujhar (or Kendujhargarh) is the district headquarters. The district has 3 Sub-Divisions, Anandapur, Champua, and Keonjhar.

title: Top Places to visit in Khordha, Odisha
content: Khordha is an administrative division of the state of Odisha, India. It was formed on April 1, 1993, by the division of former Puri District into Puri, Khordha and Nayagarh districts. In the year 2000 the district name was changed to Khordha. The district headquarters is Khordha Town. The capital

title: Top Places to visit in Jagatsinghpur, Odisha
content: Jagatsinghpur District is one of the thirty districts of Odisha in the eastern coast of India. It became a new district on 1 April 1993 (Vide Government Notification No.14218/R dated 27.03.1993 and EOG No.459 dated 01.04.1993) being separated from Cuttack district. It lies between 860 3’ E

title: Top Places to visit in Jajpur, Panikoili, Odisha
content:
Jajpur (also known as Jajapur) is a city and a municipality in Jajpur district in the Indian state of Odisha. It was the capital of Odisha during the Kesari dynasty, later supplanted by Cuttack. Now, it is the headquarters of Jajpur district.

title: Top Places to visit in Jharsuguda, Odisha
content: Jharsuguda is the district headquarters of Jharsuguda district of Odisha, India. It is the administrative headquarters of Jharsuguda district. title: Top Places to visit in Gajapati, Paralakhemundi, Odisha
content: Gajapati is a district of Odisha, India. It was created from Ganjam District in October, 1992. title: Top Places to visit in Ganjam, Chhatrapur, Odisha
content:
Ganjam district is a district in the Indian state of Odisha. Ganjam's total area is 8,070 km² (3,116 mi²).
Ganjam is a town and a notified area council in Ganjam district in the state of Odisha, India.

title: Top Places to visit in Dhenkanal, Odisha
content:
Dhenkanal is a town and a municipality in Dhenkanal district in the state of Odisha, India.
Dhenkanal District is an administrative division of Odisha, India.
 
Geography

title: Top Places to visit in Debagarh (Deogarh), Odisha
content:
Debagarh District (in Odia language), also known as Deogarh District is a district of Odisha state, India. Located in the north-western part of the state, it is one of the 30 administrative districts and has its Headquarters at Deogarh town.

title: Top Places to visit in Cuttack, Odisha
content: Cuttack is the former capital and the second largest city in the eastern Indian state of Odisha. It is also the headquarters of the Cuttack district.
